content: cozy mohair wrap skill level easy finished size approx 16-1/2 wide x 51 long excluding fringe materials 550 yds light worsted wt or worsted wt mohair/wool/nylon blend sample shown in king cole luxury mohair size us k/10 5 6 5 mm hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle gauge 3 pattern repeats 3 double_crochet 1 single_crochet = 4-1/4 on size us k/10 5 6 5 mm hook terms/abbreviations beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet repeat repeat single crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch space space stitch st 1 pattern notes if fringe is desired before beginning wrap cut seventy-two 20 lengths of yarn for fringe and set aside wrap row 1 chain 91 2 double_crochet in third chain from hook *skip 3 chain single_crochet in next chain chain 3 double_crochet in ea of next 3 chain repeat from * across working single_crochet in last chain turn row 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in first single_crochet skip 3 double_crochet *single_crochet in next space the space formed by the chain-3 on previous row chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space 1 double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * across ending with single_crochet in last space turn repeat row 2 until wrap measures 51 or to desired length fasten_off finishing fringe place 3 strands of fringe in point of each shell at both ends of wrap to attach fringe insert hook into fabric fold 3 strands in half over hook pull loop through fabric then pull ends of strands through loop on hook and tighten knot trim to desired length copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
